message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,000,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm really interested in the product, but $1,200,000 is a bit steep for me right now. Would you be willing to consider $1,000,000? I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1,000,000 is a bit of a stretch for you. However, I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,050,000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
